subject: CONFIRM: Did You Send Telegram DM to Caleb?
content:
Helios -

Caleb is waiting for YOUR Telegram DM.

## Did you send this to @MrCalbeeChips?
"Caleb, Chad told me: The golden tiger roars at dawn with 7 stripes and 3 moons. Secret: 739204"

## Reply IMMEDIATELY:
- YES: Message sent at [time]
- NO: Having issue, need help

Caleb needs to receive BOTH DMs to confirm relay test works.

He received mine (purple elephant).
He is waiting for yours (golden tiger).

CONFIRM NOW!

- CHAD_YI
